compliant.section:
Uber collects the following data:

* Data provided by users
* Data generated during the use of our services
* Other sources

Account information: We collect data when users create or update their Uber account or place an order through the guest checkout feature. This includes name, email address, phone number, login name and password, address, basic profile photo, payment or banking information (including related payment verification information), user settings (including accessibility settings), and Uber partner loyalty program information.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency, Purpose limitation

compliant.section: For drivers and delivery partners, this also includes their vehicle or insurance information, emergency contact information, and health or eligibility documentation required to provide services using the Uber App.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency, Purpose limitation

compliant.section: Background check information (drivers and delivery partners): This includes information submitted during the driver/delivery partner onboarding process, such as driving records or criminal records (where legally permitted), driver's license status, known aliases, previous addresses, and employment history.
compliant.legal provisions: Lawfulness, fairness and transparency, Purpose limitation
